<< clear memory manager functions memory >>

global

Defines a global variable.

Syntax

global variable_name
global(variable_name)
global variable_name1 ... variable_nameN

Input argument

variable_name

a string: valid variable name.

Description

global make variable in global assign value to a variable in a specified variables scope.

Example

function myfun()
global y;
y = 1;
endfunction

myfun()
who
global y
who
disp(y)
who
clear global y
disp(y)

See also

clear, who.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
